name: tk
description: A developer toolkit for Claude Code. Structured workflows, parallel agents, security scanning, multi-instance coordination.
author: colbywest5

commands.name: tk:map
commands.description: Map project and create context (AGENTS.md, .planning/). Run first.

commands.name: tk:build
commands.description: Build features using 7-phase workflow with parallel agents

commands.name: tk:qa
commands.description: QA testing with security vulnerability scanning

commands.name: tk:clean
commands.description: Cleanup codebase - dead code, unused deps

commands.name: tk:deploy
commands.description: Deploy with pre-flight checks and verification

commands.name: tk:rules
commands.description: Set global rules for all agents

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews for bugs and quality issues
